languages.text: "Неужели вы не понимаете, что Злоба просто вами манипулировал? Вы дохли, а он за счет ваших смертей процветал!"
"Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"
languages.original_text: "Неужели вы не понимаете, что Злоба просто вами манипулировал? Вы дохли, а он за счет ваших смертей процветал!"

traits.locale_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You kept on dying while he prospered off your deaths!"
"Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You kept on dying while he prospered off your deaths!"
"Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You kept on dying while he prospered off your deaths!"
"Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You kept on dying while he prospered off your deaths!"
"Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"
"Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

languages.text: 「マリスはお前を利用していただけだというのが分からないのか？お前たちが次々と死ぬのを横目に、やつはそれを踏み台にしてのし上がったんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

traits.locale_text: 「マリスはお前を利用していただけだというのが分からないのか？お前たちが次々と死ぬのを横目に、やつはそれを踏み台にしてのし上がったんだ！」

languages.text: “恶棍只不过是在利用你们，难道你们还不明白吗？你们一个接一个去竞技场上送死，而他却从你们的死亡之中获得好处！”
languages.original_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

traits.locale_text: “恶棍只不过是在利用你们，难道你们还不明白吗？你们在竞技场上丧命，而他却从你们的死亡之中获得好处！”

languages.text: «¿No veis que Malicia os estaba manipulando? ¡Seguíais muriendo uno tras otro mientras él prosperaba con vuestras muertes!».
languages.original_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

traits.locale_text: «¿No veis que Malicia os estaba manipulando? ¡Seguíais muriendo mientras él prosperaba con vuestras muertes!».

languages.text: "Begreift Ihr nicht, dass Tücke Euch nur manipuliert hat? Ihr seid einer nach dem anderen gestorben, während er von Eurem Sterben profitierte!"
languages.original_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

traits.locale_text: "Begreift Ihr nicht, dass Tücke Euch nur manipuliert hat? Ihr seid gestorben, während er von Eurem Sterben profitiert hat!"

languages.text: « Vous ne comprenez donc pas que Malice vous manipulait ? Il vous envoyait à l'abattoir pendant que lui s'en mettait plein les poches ! »
languages.original_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne comprenez donc pas que Malice vous manipulait ? Il vous envoyait à l'abattoir pendant que lui s'en mettait plein les poches ! »

languages.text: "Melanet'in hepinizden istifade ettiğini fark edemediniz mi? Hepiniz teker teker ölürken o da ölümlerinizden kâr elde ediyordu!"
languages.original_text: "Do you not understand that Malice was just manipulating you? You died one after another while he prospered off your deaths!"

traits.locale_text: "Melanet'in hepinizden istifade ettiğini fark edemediniz mi? Hepiniz teker teker ölürken o da ölümlerinizden kâr elde ediyordu!"
